We operate in "networking age"  but surrounded with people that are educated and raised in "information age ". This is what we are doing : 


#2- We have been researching concepts and applications of "CrowdSourcing" - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crowdsourcing for past  6 years , we have few products already in area of  technology http://www.asonesource.com.  Please watch this and see why we are collecting data from the crowd http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SMwJTI23bAI. You know in who wants to be a  millionaire, you have choice to ask the expert or the crowd audience. Crowd is %75 more accurate than the expert .


#3-  We have been researching concepts and applications of "Expert Sourcing". This when you use Internet network and crowdsource  the experts and focus them down to solving very specific  problem or issue through a "motivator " ( $$$ ) . watch this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cac-XdXL-Qk
